F o n t o X M L E d i t

Fonto is not compatible with this device

For an optimal experience, we highly recommend using a laptop or desktop computer. You may also choose to continue loading Fonto, however we can not guarantee you won’t run into any issues.

＋ Why am I unable to use this device?

Fonto needs a desktop grade computer to work as reliable and as fast as possible. Also, touch screens and virtual keyboards might not work as expected.

Continue anyway

Fonto is not compatible with this browser

For an optimal experience, we highly recommend using the latest version of one of the browsers displayed below.
You may also choose to continue loading Fonto, however we can not guarantee you won’t run into any issues.

Click on the icons to go to the corresponding download page.

＋ More about browsers

What is a browser?

A browser is a program on your computer which you can use to access the internet. Well-known examples are Internet Explorer, Chrome and Firefox.

How to download a new browser

You can download a browser by clicking its icon listed above. Doing so will bring you to that browser's website, where you can download its latest version.

How to update your browser

Instructions on how to update your browser can be found on the website of that browser. Please keep in mind that company computers may require support from your IT department to update browsers.

Why can't I use this browser?

We make use of the latest web technologies so Fonto can work as reliable and as fast as possible. These technologies are only available in the latest versions of the browsers listed above.

Continue anyway
 

Fonto failed to load

An error occurred while Fonto was loading. Make sure your browser meets Fonto's minimum requirements. If it does and this issue persists, please check the developer console for technical details and/or report the issue.
